content: The people of Israel will be abandoned to their enemies
Then at last his fellow countrymen
And he will stand to lead his flock with the â€™s strength,
Then his people will live there undisturbed,
Then the remnant left in Israel
They will be like dew sent by the
which no one can hold back
They will be like a lion among the animals of the forest,
pouncing and tearing as they go
The people of Israel will stand up to their foes,
